title: Diamond Floral Vanki Pendant - Addigai Design
features: Contemporary Vanki-inspired pendant featuring a floral motif with delicate diamond pavé setting. The design echoes the traditional Addigai necklace, but with a modern minimalist twist. The floral clusters create a symmetrical and balanced design, perfect for layering or standalone wear. Each diamond is meticulously set to maximize brilliance.
occasions: festive occasions like Diwali or Sankranthi
or as a sophisticated touch to office attire. Also suitable for gifting during weddings and other special events.
description: This exquisite pendant blends the timeless appeal of traditional South Indian jewelry with modern design sensibilities. The high-quality diamonds sparkle brilliantly, and the 18K gold ensures lasting durability. The Hyderabadi polish adds a touch of luxury and enhances the pendant's overall shine. This versatile piece can be worn with both traditional and contemporary outfits, making it a valuable addition to any jewelry collection.
